t: Introducing product collections on Stores | Amazon Ads
s: July 1, 2022 - Product collection is a new tile found in Store Builder that allows brands to showcase curated, related groupings of products. Instead of listing ASINs in one product grid per page, a product collection allows brands to add up to five curated collections on the same page.
